background_description: Deep blue-green open water with dark, rocky structures and patches of green algae or coral growth on the seabed, indicating a reef-like or structured aquatic environment.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Hogfish with a light pinkish-white body, yellow fins, and distinctive red markings around its eye, swimming against a dark blue-green rocky background. Its bright coloration and high contrast make it highly visible, confirming the absence of camouflage.
